org.arl.fjage.connectors

Class TcpHubConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.arl.fjage.connectors.TcpHubConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, Connector

    public class TcpHubConnector
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Connector
    TCP hub server. All incoming connections to the TCP server are aggregated into a single connector. All data in/out of the input/output streams of this connector are common across all TCP clients.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • TcpHubConnector

        public TcpHubConnector(int port,
                       boolean telnet)
        Creates a TCP server running on a specified port.
        Parameters:
        port - TCP port number.
        telnet - true to negotiate character mode using telnet protocol, false to leave the choice to the client.

      • TcpHubConnector

        Creates a TCP server running on a specified port.

        port - TCP port number.
